title: Job-seeking visa for Germany
selftext:
Hello, I want to rejoin my spouse who lives in Germany on a job-seeking visa. I currently live in India and have completed my Master's studies in India.   


I understand that Indians can apply for a job-seeking visa to move to Germany for 6 months ([https://india.diplo.de/in-en/service/-/2539332](https://india.diplo.de/in-en/service/-/2539332)). But VFS has 0 slots and the consulate is not responding to emails. Any advice is appreciated.   


p.s. if there's a different suitable sub to ask this, please lmk :)
comments: Try looking for slots after midnight. I got slot for my student visa past 2 am
